rooms.description: Entry hall designed according to Vastu principles with a welcoming space, aligning with the positive flow of energy.
Open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen, featuring Mediterranean elements such as exposed beams and terracotta tiles. The layout is designed for unobstructed flow of energy.
Modern open-plan kitchen with Mediterranean styling, strategically placed adjacent to the living room to ensure a continuous open space in compliance with Vastu and local design norms.
Home theater designed with soundproofing elements, comfortable seating, and ambient lighting to enhance the cinematic experience. Vastu principles ensure proper placement for positive energy flow.
Dining area integrated within the living space to maintain open circulation, with Mediterranean decor elements and proper alignment per Vastu guidelines.
A guest room designed for privacy and comfort. The location is chosen to promote positive energy flow as per Vastu principles.

openings.description: Main entrance facing East in accordance with Vastu norms, ensuring a welcoming atmosphere while aligning with the Mediterranean aesthetic.
Large windows providing ample natural light and ventilation. Placed to maximize energy flow as per local design norms.
Emergency exit designed for safety, in compliance with local building codes and Vastu recommendations.
